props.description: Bulk actions component rendered with a sticky position over the top of the table element.
props.title: bulkActions

props.description: Table header content.
props.title: header

props.description: Optional table footer content.
props.title: footer

props.description: Table body content.
props.title: children

props.description: Props passed to the container box element.
props.title: containerProps

props.description: Properties of the checkbox element rendered in the Bulk Actions component.

name.description: The name of the input element.
name.title: name

disabled.description: Modifies the native disabled state of the native checkbox.
disabled.title: disabled

checked.description: Modifies true/false value of the native checkbox.
checked.title: checked

appearance.description: Change the visual style of the checkbox.
appearance.title: appearance

aiGenerated.description:
Highlights the checkbox to indicate its value was generated by AI.
Applies AI gradient border that persists regardless of checked state.
aiGenerated.title: aiGenerated

indeterminate.description: If true, the component appears indeterminate. This does not set the native input element to indeterminate due to inconsistent behavior across browsers. However, we set a data-indeterminate attribute on the input.
indeterminate.title: indeterminate

props.title: checkbox

props.description: Optional link element rendered next to the Bulk Actions controller.
props.title: link

props.description: Action component that controls the Bulk Actions.
props.title: action

props.description: Lable for the checkbox element.
props.title: label

props.description: Content of the List component.
props.title: children

props.description: Placeholder text displayed in the dropdown trigger button.
props.title: placeholder

props.description:
Content to be rendered inside the dropdown popover.
Typically DataTable.DropdownAction and DataTable.DropdownDivider components.
props.title: children

props.description: Icon element to be displayed before the label.
props.title: icon

props.description: Text label for the action item.
props.title: label

props.description: Click handler for the action.
props.title: onClick

props.description: Whether the action is disabled.
props.title: disabled

props.description: Content of the section body.
props.title: children

props.description: Left-hand side text intended for displaying an item count.
props.title: itemCount

props.description: Pagination element rendered on the right-side of the footer.

onPageChange.description: Called with event and page number when a page is clicked.
onPageChange.title: onPageChange

showNumbers.description: Determines whether page numbers should be shown.
showNumbers.title: showNumbers

renderItem.description: Custom render function for pagination items.
renderItem.title: renderItem

props.title: pagination
